definition: wing (of an air force)/sports team representing a combination of entities (e.g. United Korea)
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: You know, there's like different rankings of leagues you can play in.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在不同等级的联队里打球。

sentences.english: After this win, Manchester United were promoted to the First Division.
sentences.chinese: 这次获胜之后，曼联队升入了甲组。

sentences.english: The remainder of the troops were confined to their barracks, without reckoning the regiments of the environs of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 其余的军队在军营里，巴黎四周的联队还没计算在内。

sentences.english: The All-Japan was tied for first place.
sentences.chinese: 全日本联队得并列第一。

sentences.english: These wings are subdivided into six squadrons of 12 fighters each.
sentences.chinese: 每支联队被分成六支由12架战斗机组成的中队。

sentences.english: It's about the air wing and our Navy.
sentences.chinese: 这是舰载机联队以及我们海军的任务。

sentences.english: Tevez ran straight to Neville, using his hand to suggest that his former club captain at United talks too much.
sentences.chinese: 特维斯直接跑向内维尔，用手势表示曼联队长话太多。

sentences.english: Milan will meet Manchester United for the first knock-out round of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 米兰将会在冠军联赛第一轮淘汰赛遭遇曼彻斯特联队。

sentences.english: D. C. United won the first two M. L. S. championships.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿特区联队赢得了头两个大联盟冠军。

sentences.english: but in that league I was pretty good.
sentences.chinese: 但在那个联队里，我打得相当好。

sentences.english: Soldiers of Japanese infantry 20th Regiment , 16th Division celebrate, their victory atop the destoryed city wall.
sentences.chinese: 日军第十六师团第二十联队士兵在废墟上狂欢。

sentences.english: It was evident that they had to deal with an entire regiment at the very least.
sentences.chinese: 他们所要对付的显然是一整个联队。

sentences.english: One day later, Liverpool was away at arch-rival Manchester United.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，利物浦对上世仇，曼彻斯特联队。

sentences.english: Manchester United won the double twice.
sentences.chinese: 曼彻斯特联队两次获双料冠军。

sentences.english: Two sergents of the 3rd Raiding Regiment who were rather healthy accompanied with us.
sentences.chinese: 第三突击联队的两个还算健康的军曹跟我们同行。

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
war zone/combat zone/(military) theater of operations
